body_html:
Also cc @vjpai
We would like to build TF for s390x. But boring SSL strictly has no ppc64 support. Looks like GRPC now depends on boringssl. Below is my bazel query output:

@grpc//:grpc++_unsecure
@grpc//:grpc++_base_unsecure
@grpc//:grpc_unsecure
@grpc//:grpc_common
@grpc//:census
//external:libssl
@boringssl//:ssl
@boringssl//:crypto

How would you recommend for us to proceed?
